00032   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_create_table_request(const char *tableName, const char *schemaString) {
00033     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00034     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + Serialization::encoded_length_string(tableName) + Serialization::encoded_length_string(schemaString));
00035     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_CREATE_TABLE);
00036     cbuf->append_string(tableName);
00037     cbuf->append_string(schemaString);
00038     return cbuf;
00039   }
00040 
00041   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_get_schema_request(const char *tableName) {
00042     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00043     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + Serialization::encoded_length_string(tableName));
00044     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_GET_SCHEMA);
00045     cbuf->append_string(tableName);
00046     return cbuf;
00047   }
00048 
00049   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_status_request() {
00050     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00051     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2);
00052     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_STATUS);
00053     return cbuf;
00054   }
00055 
00056   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_register_server_request(std::string &location) {
00057     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00058     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + Serialization::encoded_length_string(location));
00059     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_REGISTER_SERVER);
00060     cbuf->append_string(location);
00061     return cbuf;
00062   }
00063 
00064   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_report_split_request(TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log_dir, uint64_t soft_limit) {
00065     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00066     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + table->encoded_length() + range.encoded_length() + Serialization::encoded_length_string(transfer_log_dir) + 8);
00067     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_REPORT_SPLIT);
00068     table->encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00069     range.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00070     cbuf->append_string(transfer_log_dir);
00071     cbuf->append_long(soft_limit);
00072     return cbuf;
00073   }
00074 
00075   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_drop_table_request(const char *table_name, bool if_exists) {
00076     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00077     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 3 + Serialization::encoded_length_string(table_name));
00078     cbuf->append_short(COMMAND_DROP_TABLE);
00079     cbuf->append_bool(if_exists);
00080     cbuf->append_string(table_name);
00081     return cbuf;
00082   }
00083 
00084   const char *MasterProtocol::m_command_strings[] = {
00085     "create table",
00086     "get schema",
00087     "status",
00088     "register server",
00089     "report split",
00090     "drop table"
00091   };
00092 
00093   const char *MasterProtocol::command_text(short command) {
00094     if (command < 0 || command >= COMMAND_MAX)
00095       return "UNKNOWN";
00096     return m_command_strings[command];
00097   }
